text: Al Mahwit ( ') is one of the governorates of Yemen. ==Description== A terraced side of one of the Haraz Mountains in the governorate near Jabal An-Nabi Shu'ayb (the highest mountain in the Arabian Peninsula), west of Sanaa ===Districts=== *Al Khabt District *Al Mahwait District *Al Mahwait City District *Ar Rujum District *At Tawilah District *Bani Sa'd District *Hufash District *Milhan District *Shibam Kawkaban District ==References== Category:Governorates of Yemen
title: Al Mahwit Governorate
